title: S2 E60: Six Minutes of Parents and Children
description:
While Adam confronts his “father”, Holiday attempts to escape Juneau without an encounter with the Anders family.
Become a Six Minutes Superfan today! Get episodes a week early, ad free, and scripts for every episode. Show your support for the show by signing up at Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/sixminutespodcast
Six Minutes is produced by Gen-Z Media. For more great Gen-Z shows visit http://bestrobotever.com or follow us on Twitter and Facebook and Instagram.
